title: Is it good to have a Fitbit wrapped around your wrists at night while asleep, just to track your sleep? Wouldn’t anything that tight cause discomfort? - Quora

response.answer_text: I wear mine every night. I make it just tight enough to contact my skin. If it’s too tight it won’t work, actually. Make sure you can fit a finger under the band and you should be fine. Even if it bothers you the first night or two, you should get used to wearing it quickly - just like wearing a watch.

Wearing a Fitbit is like wearing a watch, only the proper use is to wear it lose. You should be able to slide a finger under the band. So really it's not uncomfortable to wear while sleeping, or doing other task.
